text: Manitarkal yavarum (atiyil) ore inattavarakave anri verullai; pinnar marupattuk kontanar. Umatu iraivanitamiruntu (im'maiyin kuli marumaiyil puranamakak kotukkappatum enra) oru varttai munti erpattirukkavittal avarkal enta visayattil marupattirukkinranaro, ataipparri avarkalitaiye (itarkul) mutivu ceyyappattirukkum
